name: Unosu (Nophyrg)
description:
In Unosu, a name that derives from the Spanish word for one (uno) and the Japanese word for press (Osu), your abilities are limited. You can only perform each action once until you get a power-up to recharge or advance to the next level. As the player, your challenge is to figure out how to reach a goal with the limited tools you have.

Controls:

  • Move Right: D
  • Move Left: A 
  • Jump: Space 
  • Slide: Left Shift 
  • Restart: R

Creators:
Gryphon M.
Tyler D.
